title: Recovery
description:
Kat Ramzinski, Robert Weinstein and Sam Karliner share stories about street fights, schoolkids' role plays, and a son's time in rehab. 

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Mark Giuliana, Kat Ramzinski, Ray Charles, Robert Weinstein, Kings of Leon, Piano Dreamers, Sam Karliner, U2, Jeff Barr, Kevin Allison)
